Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 5: The Dream Child
Writer: Wes Craven (characters), John Skipp (story), Craig Spector (story), Leslie Bohem (story), Leslie Bohem (screenplay)
Actors: Robert Englund, Lisa Wilcox, Kelly Jo Minter, Danny Hassel
Plot: The pregnant Alice finds Freddy Krueger striking through the sleeping mind of her unborn child, hoping to be reborn into the real world.
